attributes.title: Fall Into Rise || Part 3 || NS || 19 April 2005
attributes.description:
Title: Fall Into Rise Q&A Part 3 of 3
Name Program: Satsang
Session on: Experience Freedom of Mind and End All Your Suffering
Date: 19 April 2005
Venue: Yellow Springs, Ohio, USA

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam answers questions of participants. He clarifies the concept of ‘Dropping’ and deepens the understanding about ‘Dropping In’.

The questions that HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam answers are of incredible value to all of us, as we can all relate to the topics the participants inquire about.

How can we participate in our own #healing process?
How can we be free from physical, #emotional, and mental suffering by ‘Dropping’?
How does the world speeding up affect this process of ‘Dropping’, and how does it affect our #consciousness?
What happens exactly in our inner world and what are the phases of ‘Dropping In’?
What are the steps to ‘Drop’?
When you ‘Fall into Rise’, can you still do the same thing every day?

These are only some of the topics that are covered in this video. Watch this video, just Drop and get the experience of ‘Falling In to Rise’ instantly!

 






Website and Social Media: http://www.kailaasa.org
